results.name: Triangle read by rows, A168532 * A000012; as infinite lower triangular matrices.
comment: Left border = the partition numbers, A000041 starting with offset 1.
formula: Triangle read by rows, A168532 * A000012; where A000012 = an infinite lower
triangular matrix with all 1's. The operation takes partial row sums
starting from the right of each row.
example: First few rows of the triangle =
